trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event to provide custom sorting.
trans-unit.target: Du kan behandle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>-hendelsen for å angi egendefinert sortering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is not set and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår bare når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen er ikke angitt og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs once for each pair of cells in the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når for hvert par med cellene i kolonnen som sorteres etter.

trans-unit.source: It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, or when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29?displayProperty=fullName> overload.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer bare når brukeren klikker hodet i en kolonne med en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, eller når du kaller den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29?displayProperty=fullName>overbelaste.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When this event occurs for a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når for en kolonne med en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapsverdi for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, må du vise sortering tegnet selv via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne hendelsen til å sortere rader med celleverdiene i én kolonne eller flere kolonner.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>Egenskaper for å sammenligne celleverdier i kolonnen som er angitt i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> properties to access values in other columns through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A>Egenskaper for å få tilgang til verdier i andre kolonner i den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samlingen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The column to sort.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnen du vil sortere.

trans-unit.source: The value of the first cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den første cellen skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: The value of the second cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den andre cellen skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the first cell.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for raden som inneholder den første cellen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the second cell.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for raden som inneholder den andre cellen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the first cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for den første cellen skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis sammen med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the first cell.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den første cellen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the second cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for den andre cellen skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis sammen med den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the second cell.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den andre cellen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: Henter kolonnen er sortert.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful in determining and controlling sort behavior in programmatic sorts.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er nyttig for å fastslå og kontrollere sorterings-virkemåte i programmatisk sorteringer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> to sort.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref> sortere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row containing the first cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for raden som inneholder den første cellen skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when sorting rows based on the cell values in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du sorterer rader basert på celleverdiene i flere kolonner.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the second cell.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for raden som inneholder den andre cellen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row containing the second cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for raden som inneholder den andre cellen skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when sorting rows based on the cell values in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig når du sorterer rader basert på celleverdiene i flere kolonner.

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the second cell.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for raden som inneholder den andre cellen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the order in which the compared cells will be sorted.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir rekkefølgen sammenlignede cellene skal sorteres.

trans-unit.source: Setting this value is typically the last operation you will perform in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne verdien er vanligvis den siste operasjonen du vil utføre i et behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You will typically set this value to the return value of a comparison method such as <xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Du vil vanligvis Sett denne verdien til verdien som returneres av en sammenligningsmetode for eksempel <xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Less than zero if the first cell will be sorted before the second cell; zero if the first cell and second cell have equivalent values; greater than zero if the second cell will be sorted before the first cell.
trans-unit.target: Er mindre enn null hvis den første cellen sorteres før den andre cellen. null hvis den første cellen og andre cellen har tilsvarende verdier. større enn null hvis den andre cellen sorteres før den første cellen.
